events.message: I am submitting a claim after my car was involved in a collision last night on the highway.
The claim has been reviewed and classified under the auto accident category for further processing.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle your car accident claim and will contact you soon.
Your claim has been acknowledged. Our team understands the urgency due to the vehicle damage described.
Please provide photos of the damaged vehicle and a copy of the police report to proceed with your claim.
All requested documents including photos and police report were submitted promptly to support your case.
Our claims investigation team has begun reviewing the collision details and the submitted evidence.
The vehicle accident investigation has concluded, confirming the reported damages and liability.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the damage estimate and policy coverage.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the quick processing and fair settlement proposed for the accident.
The insurance claim for the car collision has been approved as per policy terms and conditions.
The settlement amount has been successfully processed and payment issued to the customerâ€™s account.
The claim has been officially closed after payment, with all parties satisfied with the resolution.
All claim documents and communications have been archived securely for future reference.
